main.name: Saadat Taaseen
main.occupation: Full Stack Software Engineer primarily focused on ReactJS, MongoDB, ExpressJS and NodeJS
main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Vocalist/Musician by Night. #ohSaad
main.bio: My name is Saadat, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS, and NodeJS Developer. Currently I'm working on making myself better as a programmer by doing Freelance work and creating mock websites.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Graduated as a Full Stack Developer

work.title: Software Engineering Fellow
work.description:
Completed 18 weeks of Full Stack Web Development training.
Created backend servers to contain RESTful APIs, which can be used by front-end frameworks.
Utilized Model-View-Controller method to build full stack web applications 
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to build a functional website with full CRUD and Authentication 
Accessed multiple third-party-APIs to create a visually appealing website that portrays the information in a cohesive manner.

work.title: Quality Control Scientist
work.description:
Perform various chemical and physical tests such as ‘High Pressure Liquid Chromatography’, ‘Dissolution’ of products in chemical media similar to digestive acids, ‘Infrared Spectrophotometry’ and various other experimental methods to ensure product quality meets the required standards for human consumption. 
 Responsible for proper and immediate documentation of daily activities. 
 Checking specifications to make sure chemicals are ready for release.

projects.title: JavaScript: Pokedex
projects.category: This was my first project, and I wanted to apply all the information I learned in 3 weeks. The goal was to make it visually appealing, without compromising functionality, and since this API was solid, it meant the code was less likely to break anytime soon. The project was made with three weeks worth of knowledge of Javascript, and made with only Vanilla JS

projects.title: CoVid19 Tracker
projects.category: This webpage shows the total cases, daily cases, deaths and recoveries, both globally and by country.  I used an 'npmjs' package to display graphs for visual comparison. The application consisted of algorithms used to separate the date and time which was displayed together, and focused more on functionality and displaying information.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
